label: orderingPeriod
comment: An available ordering period for this specified marketplace.
The ordering period specified in this line trade agreement.

rangeIncludes.comment: A specific period of time such as the length of time between two known date/time points, from a start date onwards, or up to an end date.

domainIncludes.comment: The contractual terms of a line trade agreement.
An actual or virtual place where buyers and sellers interact, directly or through intermediaries, to trade goods or services.
